name: Car Physics
description:
Made By: Abdelrahman Sameh

Cars Controller By: 

Realistic Car Controller

this is game it simulation the physics of real car and it have good graphics

Free Driving

Get ready for free rides in a big city and big forest. The free mode area contains large buildings, wide streets, stunt areas, and many mysterious areas.

Features: - Precise control and fun to drive vehicles even with keyboard - Any vehicle setup: street, truck, racing, drifting... - Vehicles can be rigged and configured in minutes - Vehicle damage effects, including deterioration of handling. - Multiple ground materials supported, including per-material grip and drag coefficients, ground marks, skid marks, smoke, dust, etc. - Lots of audio effects: engine, turbo, transmission, tire skid, body impacts, body scratches... - Built-in “Pause” function for vehicles without setting timeScale to zero.

-it Have 11Cars and 1 Police Car.
